text: The 2020 Everest Premier League, also known as EPL4 or Tvs EPL will be the fourth edition of the Everest Premier League, is a professional men's domestic Twenty20 cricket competition in Nepal. The tournament was supposed to be held from 8 to 22 December 2019, was rescheduled to run from 29 February to 14 March 2020, but was rescheduled again, to run from 14 to 28 March 2020. On 5 March the event was postponed again due to the coronavirus pandemic. Lalitpur Patriots are the defending champions, having won their first title in 2018. ==Personnel changes== All foreign players contesting EPL will remain exclusive to the league. Any team can offer any price for any of these players and if the team that currently owns the player agrees on the amount, the player can be sold. The amount the player is bought or sold is confidential. Window for players release for the players not in Category A is 11 – 23 January. Each team can only put their "Category A Player" (as defined by the EPL Committee) up for trade. ==Venues== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center;margin:auto" |- !
